title: When shutdown solr process it don't delete write.lock on HDFS
description:
I have Solr in cloud mode with index store in HDFS path.

When I stop one or all solr node they do not delete the write.lock on the index path.

I have set <lockType> for HDFS

comments.author: Cassandra Targett
comments.content: I believe this is a duplicate of SOLR-8335, which was closed as "Won't Fix" because it is expected behavior. Please review the comments and explanation on that issue.
